document.masterDocTitle: Nomenclatural issues in the orchid bees (Hymenoptera: Apidae: Euglossina) and an updated catalogue

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Nomenclatural issues in the orchid bees (Hymenoptera: Apidae: Euglossina) and an updated catalogue

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Plusia
Hoffmannsegg, 1817
: 52
–53 (not Ochsenheimer, 1816 ; Lepidoptera ). Type species:
Plusia superba
Hoffmannsegg, 1817
, monobasic.

Eumorpha
Friese, 1899
: 126
(not Hübner, 1807 ; Lepidoptera ). Type species:
Euglossa pulchra
Smith, 1854
, by designation of
Cockerell, 1908
: 41
.

Eufriesea
Cockerell, 1908
: 41
, replacement for
Eumorpha
Friese, 1899
. Type species:
Euglossa pulchra
Smith, 1854
, autobasic (see
Eumorpha
Friese, 1899
).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Eufriesia
Lutz & Cockerell, 1920
: 544 , unjustified emendation of
Eufriesea
Cockerell, 1908
.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Euplusia
Moure, 1943
: 189
–190, replacement for
Plusia
Hoffmannsegg, 1817
. Type species:
Plusia superba
Hoffmannsegg, 1817
, autobasic (see
Plusia
Hoffmannsegg, 1817
).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Paleoeuglossa
Poinar, 1998
: 30 . Type species:
Paleoeuglossa melissiflora
Poinar, 1998
, by original designation. (According to D.W. Roubik, not an
Eufriesea
due to the presence of scutellar tuft).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Eufriesea laniventris
[
Euglossa
] (
Ducke, 1902 a: 403
), Lectotype 3 , designated by
Moure, 1967 b
: 408 , MPEG : BRAZIL , Pará, Belém, leg. Ducke: The nomen appeared first both in a key and accompanied by a brief description (
October 1 st
), thus giving this paper priority over the actual description,
Ducke, 1902 b
: 567, 575 (December).

subSubSection.paragraph:
Eufriesea pretiosa
[
Euglossa
( Eulema !)] (
Friese, 1903 : 575
), Syntype Ƥ,
Moure, 1967 b
: 408 (cf. ICZN Art. 74.6),?; “ AMNH ” (false type ): COLOMBIA , Valle del Cauca, Cauca–Tal, near Popayán: Friese cited Ecuador and Caucatal as the type locality. However, Cauca–Tal is in Colombia . The presumably false type from AMNH is from Ecuador (Tungurahua, Santa Ines).
